title: [Necropolis, Narthex]
description: A headless humanoid statue sits on a throne atop a raised rostrum against the eastern wall.  Spiderwebs completely cover the statue, obfuscating its intended identity.  Cradled in the mass of webbing in the outstretched right hand is a bloody heart, which still looks fresh enough to beat.
paths: Obvious exits: north, southwest, west, northwest
